notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: LWZ, WX and YL have designed this survey, JZ, RZ, YC, WX and JL have collected data, LWZ, GW, SL and WX have managed and analyzed data, YL has controlled the quality of data collection and analysis, JZ, RZ and WX have drafted the manuscript. YL has edited the manuscript. All authors have interpreted the results, revised the report and completed the final version.The author(s) read and approved the final manuscript.
